name: Oven-Roasted Chicken Thighs
author: Aroma and Essence
summary: Try my oven-grilled chicken thighs and you will fall in love! Sprinkle with fresh finely chopped parsley and serve with a warm potato salad, or fries, or both.
ingredients: ¼ cup Thai sweet chili sauce
½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Whisk soy sauce, chili sauce, paprika, parsley, and pepper together in a large glass or ceramic bowl
Add chicken thighs and toss to evenly coat
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for up to 1 hour
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place a wire rack on the tray
Remove chicken thighs from the marinade and shake off excess; transfer to the prepared rack
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Turn and continue to bake until no longer pink in the centers and juices run clear, 10 to 15 minutes more
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
